fields.name: Barrier Base Mineral SPF 50
fields.description: A non-comedogenic mineral sunscreen with zinc oxide and niacinamide for broad-spectrum protection and skin barrier support.

fields.name: Sunrise Serum Drops SPF 35
fields.description: A featherlight daily serum with SPF 35 and vitamin C to protect and brighten without clogging pores.

fields.name: City Block UV Defense Mist SPF 40
fields.description: A refreshing, invisible SPF 40 mist ideal for on-the-go protection—wear alone or over makeup to defend against UV and pollution.

fields.name: Deep Moisture Lotion
fields.description: A rich, fast-absorbing body lotion that delivers 24-hour hydration with hyaluronic acid and oat extract to restore softness and suppleness.

fields.name: Radiance Body Lotion
fields.description: A lightweight body lotion infused with vitamin C and botanical brighteners to visibly even skin tone and enhance glow.

fields.name: PM Repair Lotion
fields.description: A nourishing nighttime lotion powered by ceramides and peptides to support overnight skin repair and barrier recovery.

fields.name: Essence Toner
fields.description: A hydrating toner-meets-essence packed with cucumber, glycerin, and panthenol to prep, plump, and refresh skin before serum or moisturizer.

fields.name: BHA Clarifying Toner
fields.description: A clarifying exfoliating toner formulated with 2% salicylic acid to help unclog pores, control oil, and prevent breakouts.

fields.name: Purifying Gel Wash
fields.description: A refreshing gel cleanser with tea tree and green tea extracts that deeply cleanses without stripping, ideal for oily or blemish-prone skin.

fields.name: Bright Start Cleanser
fields.description: A gentle morning cleanser infused with papaya enzymes and vitamin B5 to refresh skin and promote a radiant start to the day.

fields.name: Micellar Water Cleanser
fields.description: A rinse-free micellar formula that effortlessly lifts makeup, dirt, and oil while hydrating and soothing the skin.

fields.name: Aloe Repair Gel
fields.description: A soothing, fast-absorbing gel enriched with aloe vera and chamomile to calm irritation, hydrate dry skin, and promote natural healing—perfect for sensitive, sun-stressed, or post-treatment skin..

fields.name: Hyaluronic Boost Serum
fields.description: A triple-weight hyaluronic acid serum that delivers multi-depth hydration for plump, dewy, and refreshed skin.

fields.name: PM Repair Serum
fields.description: A night-active treatment with niacinamide, peptides, and bakuchiol to reduce signs of fatigue and boost overnight renewal.

fields.name: Redness Relief Serum
fields.description: A calming serum formulated with centella asiatica and azelaic acid to soothe irritated skin and reduce visible redness.

fields.name: Radiant Eye Serum
fields.description: A lightweight eye serum enriched with caffeine, peptides, and vitamin C to brighten, de-puff, and hydrate the delicate eye area.

fields.name: Citrus Peel Exfoliant
fields.description: A gentle enzyme exfoliant with citrus fruit acids and AHAs to resurface dull skin and refine texture without irritation.

fields.name: Radiant Face Scrub
fields.description: A creamy exfoliator with rice powder and jojoba beads that polishes the skin for a soft, glowing finish.

fields.name: Green Tea Clay Scrub
fields.description: A dual-action scrub with kaolin clay and green tea extract that detoxifies, exfoliates, and calms in one step.

fields.name: Deep Nourishing Moisturizer
fields.description: A velvet-rich cream loaded with shea butter, ceramides, and squalane to deeply replenish and lock in moisture

fields.name: Renew Night Elixir Moisturizer
fields.description: A silky nighttime elixir formulated with natural oils and botanical extracts to rejuvenate tired skin by morning.
